title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: Latamverse metapackage brings together comprehensive collection R packages providing access APIs functions curated datasets Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Mexico, Peru. integrates real-time historical data retrieved public RESTful APIs, Nager.Date, World Bank API, REST Countries API, also offering extensive curated collections open datasets covering economics, demographics, public health, environmental data, political indicators, social metrics, cultural information. Latamverse package installs attaches six core subpackages. first ArgentinAPI, provides APIs functions curated datasets Argentina, including resources exchange rates, inflation, political figures, national holidays. second BrazilDataAPI, offers APIs functions curated datasets Brazil, data postal codes, banks, economic indicators, holidays, company registrations. third ChileDataAPI, focused Chile, covering financial indicators UF, UTM, Dollar, Euro, Yen, Copper, Bitcoin, IPSA index, national holidays. fourth ColombiAPI, provides APIs functions curated datasets Colombia, featuring geographic locations, cultural attractions, economic indicators, demographic data, national holidays. fifth MexicoDataAPI, delivers APIs functions curated datasets Mexico, including economic indicators, population, literacy rates, unemployment, holidays, air quality, state income surveys. Finally, PeruAPIs offers APIs functions curated datasets Peru, covering economic indicators, demographics, national holidays, administrative divisions, electoral data, biodiversity.

previous_headings: Introduction
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: install Latamverse package, use following:
code: # Install from CRAN   install.packages("Latamverse")  # Then load the package:  library(Latamverse)

previous_headings: Introduction
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: Latamverse imports depends several subpackages. Therefore, detach individual subpackage (like PeruAPIs) Latamverse still loaded.

previous_headings: Introduction > Important Note on Detaching Packages
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
code: # This will raise an error  detach("package:PeruAPIs", unload = TRUE)

previous_headings: Introduction
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: properly unload subpackage, must first detach Latamverse: installing Latamverse package attach following packages R session: ArgentinAPI BrazilDataAPI ChileDataAPI ColombiAPI MexicoDataAPI PeruAPIs
code: # First detach the metapackage detach("package:Latamverse", unload = TRUE)  # Now you can safely detach the subpackage detach("package:PeruAPIs", unload = TRUE)

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: ArgentinAPI package provides comprehensive unified interface access open data Argentina multiple public RESTful APIs, including ArgentinaDatos API, REST Countries API, World Bank API. sources, users can easily retrieve information exchange rates, inflation, political figures, national holidays, economic indicators, general country-level statistics. addition API-access functions, package includes collection curated datasets covering diverse domains economic indicators, biodiversity, agriculture, human rights, genetic data, consumer prices.

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse > ArgentinAPI
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: get_dollar_exchange_rates() – Retrieves recent exchange rates different dollar markets (official, blue, MEP, CCL) ArgentinaDatos API. get_presidential_events() – Retrieves list official presidential events ArgentinaDatos API. get_argentina_child_mortality(): Get Argentina’s -5 Mortality Rate data World Bank.

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: corn_nitrogen_df: Argentina Corn Yield & Nitrogen Data data frame yield monitor data corn field Argentina, including variables nitrogen application, yield, topography, block replicates. STRs_argentina_list: STRs Allelic Frequencies Argentina list allelic frequencies 24 Short Tandem Repeat (STR) genetic markers collected different populations across Argentina.

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: BrazilDataAPI package provides unified interface access open data BrasilAPI, REST Countries API, Nager.Date API, World Bank API, focus Brazil. allows users easily retrieve --date information postal codes, banks, economic indicators, holidays, company registrations, international country-level data, public holidays information, economic development data relevant Brazil. addition API-access functions, package includes collection curated datasets related Brazil, covering diverse domains demographics (male female population state year), river levels Manaus, environmental emission factors São Paulo, Brazilian film festivals, historical yellow fever outbreaks.

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse > BrazilDataAPI
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: get_country_info_br(): Get key country information Brazil. get_brazil_child_mortality(): Get Brazil’s -5 Mortality Rate data World Bank. get_brazil_cpi(): Get Brazil’s Consumer Price Index (2010 = 100) data World Bank.

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse > BrazilDataAPI
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: Brasil_females_df: Brazilian Female Demographics & Mortality data frame containing population counts mortality information females Brazil, disaggregated federal states abridged age groups, years 1991 2000. manaus_ts: Monthly Average Heights Rio Negro Manaus univariate time series monthly average river heights Rio Negro Manaus. series contains 1080 observations spanning 90 years, January 1903 December 1992.

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: ChileDataAPI package provides unified interface access open data multiple public RESTful APIs, including FINDIC API, REST Countries API, World Bank API, Nager.Date. focus Chile, package enables users retrieve real-time historical data financial indicators (UF, UTM, Dollar, Euro, Yen, Copper price per pound, Bitcoin, IPSA index), holidays, international demographic geopolitical information. addition API-based data retrieval, ChileDataAPI includes curated collection datasets cover diverse aspects Chilean society environment, human rights violations Pinochet regime, electoral data, census samples, health surveys, seismic events, territorial codes, environmental measurements.

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse > ChileDataAPI
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: get_chile_utm(): Returns monthly values Unidad Tributaria Mensual (UTM). get_chile_yen(): Provides exchange rate Japanese Yen CLP. get_country_info_cl(): Get essential information Chile country full name

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse > ChileDataAPI
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: census_chile_2017_df: Data frame containing microdata 2017 Chilean census, specifically commune San Pablo. dataset includes 7,512 observations, variable names data values Spanish. chile_earthquakes_tbl_df: Tibble containing information significant (perceptible) earthquakes occurred Chile January 1st, 2012 present.

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: ColombiAPI package provides unified interface access open data API-Colombia, World Bank API, Nager.Date API, REST Countries API, focus Colombia. allows users retrieve --date historical information topics geographic locations, cultural attractions, economic indicators, demographic data, national holidays, key country-level details. addition API-access functions, package includes collection curated datasets related Colombia. datasets cover wide range topics including air quality monitoring, education (public schools), business holiday calendars, agricultural exports (coffee), regulatory information (cannabis licenses), climate data (Medellin rainfall), urban development (Bogota shopping malls).

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse > ColombiAPI
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: get_colombia_cpi(): Get Colombia’s Consumer Price Index (2010 = 100) World Bank. get_colombia_departments(): Get Colombia’s Departments API Colombia. get_colombia_energy_use(): Get Colombia’s Energy Use (kg oil equivalent per capita) World Bank.

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse > ColombiAPI
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: Bogota_business_Date: Date object listing official business dates Bogota. Colombia_coffee_tbl_df: tibble details Colombian coffee export import year 2016.

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: MexicoDataAPI package provides unified interface access open data World Bank API, REST Countries API, Nager.Date API, focus Mexico. allows users retrieve --date information topics economic indicators, population figures, literacy rates, unemployment levels, basic geopolitical information, official public holidays. addition API-access functions, package includes set curated datasets related Mexico. cover areas air quality monitoring, state-level income surveys, postal abbreviations, election results, regional forest classification.

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse > MexicoDataAPI
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: get_mexico_life_expectancy(): Get Mexico’s Life Expectancy World Bank get_mexico_literacy_rate(): Get Mexico’s Literacy Rate (Age 15+) World Bank get_mexico_population(): Get Mexico’s Population (Total) World Bank

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse > MexicoDataAPI
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: mexico_elections_df: Data frame containing subset 2012 Mexico Elections Panel Study. mex_income_2016_tbl_df: Tibble containing household-level income data associated demographic characteristics 2016 ENIGH (Household Income Expenditure Survey).

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: PeruAPIs package provides unified interface access open data World Bank API, Nager.Date API, REST Countries API, focus Peru. allows users retrieve --date historical information topics economic indicators, demographics, national holidays, key geopolitical details. addition API-access functions, package includes curated collection open datasets related Peru. datasets cover wide range topics including administrative divisions, electoral data, demographics, biodiversity educational classifications.

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse > PeruAPIs

text: get_peru_literacy_rate(): Get Peru’s Adult Literacy Rate data World Bank. get_peru_life_expectancy(): Get Peru’s Life Expectancy Birth data World Bank. get_peru_population(): Get Peru’s Total Population data World Bank.

previous_headings: Introduction > Included Packages in the Latamverse > PeruAPIs
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: andean_migrants_health_df: data frame containing health data random sample Peruvians born Andes mountains, since migrated lower altitudes. birds_peru_tbl_df: tibble containing updated list bird species recorded Peru, based recent taxonomic revisions South American.

previous_headings: Introduction
title: Latamverse: A Metapackage for Latin American Countries via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets
text: Latamverse represents unified entry point accessing analyzing data six major Latin American countries: Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Mexico, Peru. combining real-time API connections curated datasets, simplifies process discovering, retrieving, integrating diverse sources information across key domains economics, demographics, public health, environment, politics, culture. metapackage reduces technical barriers associated collecting data multiple platforms also promotes reproducible research, comparative regional studies, data-driven teaching practices. modular structure, built upon country-specific packages, ensures flexibility scalability, allowing users focus generating insights advancing knowledge rather data wrangling. Ultimately, Latamverse provides researchers, educators, policymakers, data scientists comprehensive ecosystem enhances study understanding Latin America, fostering collaboration innovation within global R community.
